name: WILDSTAR - Issue 2
description:
Our Heroes go to the Capital of an Autumn Rock planet Hinoku to talk to its Royal leader to get some intel on the Origin of the Wildstar.. but there's trouble afoot!

[ The file you're purchasing is a PDF of the comic, you will need a PDF/CBR reader to view it ]
